objectDesc.p: Stone, ?x?, 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 18 line(s) per column, 65-70 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Discovered by Dayr Anbā Shanūdah (White Monastery) at Dayr Anbā Shanūdah, Miṣr in situ painted on a wall.

msIdentifier.msName: in situ, Dayr Anbā Shanūdah (White Monastery), Dayr Anbā Shanūdah, Miṣr.

sourceDesc.bibl: Lefebvre, Gustave, Recueil des inscriptions grecques-chrétiennes d'Égypte, no. 237, p. 45, Institut Francais d'Archeologie Orientale du Caire: Le Caire, Égypte, 1907. OCLC 7065867.
